byline.docAuthor: A. Cingöz, D. C. Yost, and J. Ye

byline.affiliation: JILA, National Institute of Standards and Technology and University of Colorado, Department of Physics

byline.docAuthor: A. Ruehl, M. E. Fermann and I. Hartl

front.address: 1044 Woodridge Ave., Ann Arbor, MI 48105, USA
front.div:
Abstract: We report on the power scalability of cavity-enhanced high harmonic generation (HHG)
with a Yb-fiber frequency comb delivering 120-fs pulses at 80-W average power and a repetition
rate of 154 MHz. With 5 kW of average intracavity power, plateau harmonics with average powers
beyond the microwatt level have been achieved.
front.keyword: OCIS codes: (320.7090) Ultrafast lasers; (140.7240) UV, EUV, and X-ray lasers
